title: Report
description: This schema defines the Report entity. Reports are static information computed from data periodically that includes data in text, table, and visual form.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies this report.

name.description: Name that identifies this report instance uniquely.

fullyQualifiedName.description: A unique name that identifies a report in the format 'ServiceName.ReportName'.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this report. It could be title or label from the source services.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this report.

service.description: Link to service where this report is hosted in.

usageSummary.description: Latest usage information for this database.
